summary: The diff successfully implements all requested requirements. Backend script CRUD operations (REQ-4) are present with getAllScripts, getScriptsByAuthor, and getScript methods. Frontend includes restored script listing with ScriptGrid component (REQ-1), My Scripts page with edit/delete functionality (REQ-2), and the detail page with syntax highlighting infrastructure (REQ-3). All acceptance criteria have corresponding implementations in the modified files.

hallucinated_features.description: Script search and filtering functionality with searchScriptsByTitle and filterScriptsByCategory methods
hallucinated_features.reason: Backend includes searchScriptsByTitle and filterScriptsByCategory query methods, and frontend implements ScriptSearch component with debounced search and category filtering. These features were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Deleted scripts tracking with soft delete functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: Backend implements a deletedScripts Map and getDeletedScripts query method to track and retrieve deleted scripts. This soft delete feature was not requested in the restoration requirements.

Backend includes userProfiles Map with getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, and saveCallerUserProfile methods for managing user profiles. This feature was not part of the script restoration requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Hero banner with generated image asset
hallucinated_features.reason: HomePage displays a hero banner section with image at /assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png and gradient overlay. This visual enhancement was not requested and contradicts the non-goal of not changing visual design.
